name: TRCKN
description:
You've eaten too many gas station burritos. HITCH (JOIN TOGETHER...) ALL THE TRAILERS TO ALLEVIATE YOUR HEARTBURN

Controls: WASD or arrow keys to move. ESC or P to pause. T for aerial view

(Web build is a little glitchy, Recommend to download a build for best performance) 

Truck/Trailers was made by Connor. City assets are from Synty Studios. Audio was both recorded by us and from freesound.org. Code is by Chris and Tomas.
